description: A story of teenage conflict - the predicament of a youth who rebels against his parents' middle-class goals and conventions. Away from home and high school he finds the world a cold place to go it alone. Ideals are no defence when the need dor money leads to shady practices. This feature film is a study of the sources of delinquency in an affluent society, mirroring many of the problems and frustrations of young people. Cast includes: Julie Biggs, Peter Kastner, Charmion King, Ron Taylor, John Vernon.
